trans-unit.source: Specifies the class a type or member uses to filter the types that are displayed in the class browser dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a classe de que um tipo ou membro utiliza para filtrar os tipos que são apresentados na caixa de diálogo do browser de classe.
Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The class you use to filter the types to display in the class browser dialog box must implement <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]A classe que utilizar para filtrar os tipos a apresentar na caixa de diálogo do browser de classe tem de implementar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeFilterProviderAttribute.TypeFilterProviderTypeName%2A> property to determine the name of the filter class.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeFilterProviderAttribute.TypeFilterProviderTypeName%2A>propriedade para determinar o nome da classe de filtro.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeFilterProviderAttribute.TypeFilterProviderTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a utilização de atributos, consulte [atributos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeFilterProviderAttribute"></xref> class by using the specified type name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeFilterProviderAttribute"> </xref> classe utilizando o nome do tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the type that implements <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider"></xref> to apply to the class or member.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o nome do tipo que implemente <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider"> </xref> a aplicar à classe ou membro.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeFilterProviderAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeFilterProviderAttribute"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that implements <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider"></xref> to apply to the class or member.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>que implementa <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider"> </xref> a aplicar à classe ou membro.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the type that implements <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do tipo que implemente <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the type that implements <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o nome do tipo que implemente <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider"> </xref>.
